title: NEED YOUR GUYS HALP
body:
The yellow circle flash on Kayne indicates contact with Leona's E

E hit or miss?

replies.body:
It hits, but your missing a crucial interaction here.

Draven hits leona with his E, canceling the dash.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rL9Vj6LH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-16T02:19:31.234+0000)
>
> It hits, but your missing a crucial interaction here.
> 
> Draven hits leona with his E, canceling the dash.

Ty i totaly missed that too
What the hell is with the dodgy camera work? Why is Draven near off the screen when the focus is on him?
Because they clearly didn't notice that the Draven E was there.

Yeh. someone answer it.

Did Leona’s E touched Kayne first or MF killed Kayne with her ultimate before Leo’s E touched anything.

If Leo’s E did touched Kayne then why didn’t Leo’s body teleport to Kaynes death location?

If Leona was the last person to touch Kayne with her E then why didn’t Leona get the kill?

{{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:48}}
